attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS!😱😱
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app to support orange daddy Donald!😚😻The best president ever🤪but it took 80 days just to download🤬🙄I was upset, of course, but I waited because anything for my favorite orange rapist😹❤️anyway after it finally downloaded, i opened it and everything was fine for the first couple of minutes until trumps face came on the screen and told me to vote for him🍊😚I was obviously going to😘😹but the video wouldn’t stop!👿💩I tried for one hour trying to make it stop!😿my ears started bleeding🩸 and I had to drink my blood so it wouldn’t get on my Trump 2020 carpet👅🩸🇺🇸after safely driving myself to the hospital, I went back home to find out that my husband and kids left me!😡😭when I texted him asking why he said it’s because trumps wife malaria 🦠 hacked his phone and told him to vote for the oompa loompa🍊😘he said he cute his ears off and left the phone in my house!😡i went back into my room crying but got scared when I saw Trump cardboard cutouts!👿🙄I immediately got turned on by the Cheeto🤪😻But they started attacking me😿I ran for my life. Using my seductive skills I seduced them and killed all of them! Now I have stopped using technology(I am writing this from my new boyfriends cats neighbors phone, whom I am having an affair with🤫) and afternoon becoming a liberal my IQ went up quickly!😱anyway don’t download this app unless u are suicidal!🤬🙄😢❤️😩👿vote trump out of office plz I am scared of the orange god now😿🤬😡🙄

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: This app is so disgustingly racist! It also has very bad quality and it doesn’t even download fast....it took SEVERAL hours just for it to download which doesn’t look very good for the creators. So of course I’m gonna give this app a 1 star rating not just for the quality but for the outrageous things it makes people believe😤 This is so disturbing! And to think I was expecting more from my “beloved” president who I thought believed in equal rights😔 but it turns he doesn’t really care about anyone but himself at all🤬 he seems really mean and like a big baby h0wEvEr I decided to give him several chances but they clearly all never worked out😒 my phone almost even BLEW UP at the time I tried to delete it!! And it turns out my secret FBI agent was contacting the Chinese gov to steal my info as well as some Russian spies to scam me and hack my information. I have this app many chances to change, I even tried putting it in rice🍚 but it wouldn’t budge! The app said if I kept trying it it would yeet my neighbors into outer space so of course I had to get rid of it for good✌🏽 and I eventually did but the app did not give up without a fight, and when I said “WHY ARE YOU GIVING ME SO MUCH HELL WHAT DID I DO?!?!” it automatically turned into Hellen Keller🙈😎 IT DIDNT STOP TRYING TO HACK ME AND I WAS SO SICK OF IT! But I contacted my officials and they handled it for me☺️😘 this app is terrible and shouldn’t be downloaded by anyone meaning it needs to be taken down NOW!!! The hypocrisy, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, racism, and xenophobia is just not it for me so y’all don’t stan this app if you don’t want acne🤩🥰🧚🏽‍♀️✨💓
